info.description:
A personal geek media tracker API - Track anime, movies, series, games, manga, books and music
Features: Personal lists, progress tracking, ratings, favorites, and more
info.title: Geekery API

get.description: Get paginated list of all items from the global catalog

post.description: Create a new item in the global catalog (admin only in the future)

get.description: Search items by title (case-insensitive) with pagination
Get a specific item from the catalog by its ID

put.description: Update an existing item in the catalog (admin only in the future)

delete.description: Delete an item from the catalog (admin only in the future)

get.description: Get user's personal tracking list with pagination and filters

post.description: Add a catalog item to user's personal tracking list

parameters.description: Item to add (item_id required, status optional)
parameters.name: item

get.description: Get statistics about user's tracking list (totals by status, favorites count)
Get a specific item from user's list by ID

put.description: Update a user's list item (status, rating, progress, etc)

delete.description: Remove an item from user's tracking list

get.description: Get a list of all available tags

post.description: Create a new tag for categorizing items

get.description: Get a specific tag by its ID

delete.description: Delete a tag from the database

volumes.description: Total de volumes (manga/LN sempre tem, books às vezes)

anime_data.description: Dados específicos por tipo (apenas um será não-nil baseado no Type)

external_metadata.description: Metadados de APIs externas (MAL, IMDb, etc)

duration.description: Duração total do álbum em segundos

x-enum-comments.ProgressTypeReading: Books, Manga, Light Novels - chapter/volume/page (todos opcionais)

x-enum-descriptions: Books, Manga, Light Novels - chapter/volume/page (todos opcionais)

valid.description: Valid is true if Time is not NULL

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token (future implementation)
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
